```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
test_vest <- read_html("https://datahub.io/higorspinto/car-sales-world-annual")
description <- test_vest %>% html_nodes(".readable-width") %>% html_text()
description %>%
  pluck(2) %>%
  str_remove_all("\n")
```
